alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 6:59PM CDT until March 26 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JASPER AND SOUTHEASTERN NEWTON COUNTIES... At 659 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Martin to near Meehan to Orange, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Duffee, Rose Hill, Orange and Chunky. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
